---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an idea or improvement
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## What would you like to see?
A clear description of the feature or improvement.

## Why would this be useful?
Explain the problem this would solve or the benefit it would provide.

## How should it work?
Describe how you imagine this feature working.

Example:
```powershell
pwsh -File C:\SolidStack\bin\solidstack.ps1 myfeature
# Expected output...
```

## Alternatives considered
Are there other ways to achieve this? Why is this approach better?

## Additional context
Any other information, mockups, or examples.
